column4: anyone know how to find out if I have a  PPPoE Cable modem? I Dont think I do...
well then i cant find a guide on how to get my internet working
from what ive gathered from the wiki, i need PPPoE :P
just plug the cable in and you're on the net
does your network card LED is blinking or not?
sudo dhclient eth0 (basically the same as "sudo ifdown eth0 && sudo ifup eth0"
i'll be here for a while
it looked fine. something is not right.
ifconfig shows you two devices - eth0 and lo, correct?
net drivers are installed by default unless there are special ones
ok. sudo ifdown eth0 && sudo ifup eth0 does NOT do the trick (it should!)
does this file, resolv.conf, exists in /etc ??
ls /etc - it'll give you the list of files
